content:
Act I, Scene I
(Enter Jotaro Kujo, dressed in his trademark outfit, standing on a city street)

Jotaro:
Oh, fate, that doth doth play thy game
With me, Jotaro, of the Joestar name
For I am cursed with the Stand,
A power that doth threaten all of man

(He raises his hand, summoning Star Platinum)

Jotaro:
But fear not, for I shall use this might
To vanquish evil and restore the right
With every foe that doth stand in my way
I shall strike them down, without delay

(Enter Dio Brando, dressed in his flamboyant attire)

Dio:
Hark, Jotaro, how doth thou still stand
When I, the great Dio, doth command
A power far greater than thy own
With the World, I shall rule alone

Jotaro:
Thou art a fool, Dio, to think so
For Star Platinum doth strike like a blow
We shall settle this, once and for all
In a battle, that shall make the world fall

(They engage in a fierce battle, as the lights dim)
